name: Blooming Memories
description:
Our ancestors define what we are today. The real spaces we occupy are the result of their work and effort. Connect with the space and remember their deeds. Bring life again to their rest places and bloom their favourite flowers around their graves. 

Read their stories and fly through the space. The innocence of a little bird will bring freedom and remembrance to this cementery. The connection we made, the memories we take are what define us in the future. 

Take a break and connect with yourself.

A game by Los Solfamidas for Margot Talent Game Jam
